name: Pizza Time (DopePikachu)
description:
Play as a hungry guy who's out to get pizza from his favourite pizza place, during a zombie apocalypse. 

BYOG THEME : 1 second
- You will only get  1 second to save your car, save it before the second runs out!!

Controls:

- A-D : move the car left/ right

- Pick up powerups for lives (pizza icon) and slow motion attempts (watch icon)

- As the obstacles get near your car, Slow motion is activated.
Click and swipe on the highlighted dangers during slow motion to keep them from touching and damaging the car. 

Be fast, you only get one second! 

#byog2020
